rules_text:
Trample
When Mamizou enters, choose one –
• [i]From Sado – [/i]Mamizou becomes a copy of target creature, except it's 4/4 and has trample.
• [i]From Gensokyo – [/i]Create two 1/1 green Dog creature tokens with “When this creature enters, you may have it become a copy of target creature, except it's 1/1.”
artist: 瞑丸 イヌチヨ/Meimaru Inuchiyo
